mapper.select: select from TSSO_ORGAN ORDER by ORGAN_ORDER_NUM ASC
select case when max(ORGAN_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(ORGAN_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TSSO_ORGAN

select * from TSSO_ORGAN where ORGAN_ORDER_NUM = (select max(ORGAN_ORDER_NUM) from TSSO_ORGAN where ORGAN_ORDER_NUM<(select ORGAN_ORDER_NUM from TSSO_ORGAN where ORGAN_ID=#{id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}) and ORGAN_PARENT_ID=#{parentId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}) and ORGAN_PARENT_ID=#{parentId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}

select * from TSSO_ORGAN where ORGAN_ORDER_NUM = (select min(ORGAN_ORDER_NUM) from TSSO_ORGAN where ORGAN_ORDER_NUM>(select ORGAN_ORDER_NUM from TSSO_ORGAN where ORGAN_ID=#{id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} ) and ORGAN_PARENT_ID=#{parentId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}) and ORGAN_PARENT_ID=#{parentId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
select count(ORGAN_ID) from TSSO_ORGAN where ORGAN_PARENT_ID=#{id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
select from TSSO_ORGAN where ORGAN_STATUS='启用'
select ORGAN_ID, ORGAN_NAME, ORGAN_SHORT_NAME, ORGAN_NO, ORGAN_CODE,ORGAN_PARENT_ID, ORGAN_PARENT_ID_LIST from TSSO_ORGAN where ORGAN_STATUS='启用'
